entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as feeling happy after completing the first task.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: The Horntail is mentioned as a dragon that Harry zoomed around on his Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt

relationships.description: Lee Jordan picked up the golden egg and weighed it in his hands.
Harry felt happy because Ron was back on his side.
